name: contact
text: Contact our medical consultant and let them guide you through the whole process.

name: decide
text: Decide your medical tour plan mutually with our consultant.

name: ticket
text: Get your tickets booked and fix the date for the procedure.

name: appointment
text: Leave it all to us. Sit back, relax, and wait for your appointment.

name: pickup
text: We'll pick you up from your arrival location and escort you back and forth between the hotel and the clinic.

name: result
text: We'll follow up with you until you see the result and you're fully recovered.
